1111.title: Rini falls down the rabbit hole

choices: The entire cake! Whoa the table fits between 2 of my fingers now!
11113.content:
Rini found her in a literal black room, or rather a black infinite void.
All Rini could see was nothingness in all directions as far as the eye could see except for a table.
If Amy aka Sailor Mercury we’re here she’d probably go on about it being some sort of alternate space warped into an endless void.



“Ouch! Not my best landing! Huh where am I” she said.


She then stood up and walked to the table.
When she got to it she realized it was made of clear glass.
Rini also noticed to her surprise she could barely see on top of it.
The table was almost taller than her and surely the biggest she had seen.


On the table was a whole big cake on a plate already sliced up.
With it was a note but it was written in some strange language she couldn’t read.

The only 2 words in English were
“EAT ME”

Rini was skeptical but her stomach suddenly growled and she realized she hadn’t gotten to have lunch or breakfast
Even her dinner the night before was small being mostly foods she hated..
She was downright famished!


Several minutes passed and she couldn’t take it any longer.
Like her future mother Serena she couldn’t will her self to resist.

Rini struggled to reach the cake serving platter.
Finally getting it she then ate _______
Afterwards she started to feel strange.
She got the sense her surroundings were getting Smaller?

155311.content:
Ruby siged heavily as she stared into the dark cave. " This should be easy..... I hope." She says to herself as she tries to prepare herself to run into the darkness of the cave. She readys Crescent Rose and charges into the darkness. She runs deeper and deeper into the cavern as she begins seeing strange things out of the corner of her eyes as she ran. Suddenly she's standing at the edge of a large pit, she attempts to stop but regardless falls down into the abyss.



When she comes to her she's lying on a tile floor. " Oww." She whispers as she looks up, but finds no hole above her head. She's now lieing in a parlor of sorts, her weapon lying next to her. As she reaches for it, somone else grabs it. It was Weiss, " Hey, give that back!" Ruby shouts, it was that girl she had been partnered with. Ruby chases her to a smaller door, she had cornered her. " Ha, nowhere to run!" Weiss just points her saber to the floor as a circle surrounds her feet. She instantly begins shrinking until she's small enough to slip through the door.



Ruby just squeed at the sight. " Aww, look how cute you are!" Weiss just opened the little door and runs off. Ruby has to think fast, she has no weapon and has no idea where she is.

She also noticed her cape was gone and her boots turned into shoes. There are four doors in this room. Two being tiny, and two being atleast fifty feet tall. Ruby looks to the table and sees a red drink and a box of chocolate chip cookies, along with four keys matching there respective doors. Her stomach growls. " Maybe a little break wouldn't hurt."

Which dose she pick?

15532.content:
( http://ookamisanandhersevencompanions.wi... For those unfamiliar with the characters.)

Okami- San stretched as she walked home from the gym. It as a warm spring day outside, the sun still shining bright despite the late afternoon hour. As she walked down the road she noticed a friend of hers, Tsurugaya. It would be difficult to miss her distinctive maid attire. " Hey, Tsurugaya, what are you doing out so late." Instead of responding the maid simply smiled and began running away.

Okami gave chase finding her friends reaction to be very strange. It seemed she was leading her to a field. After a while Tsurugaya just seemed to vanish. " What the hell?" Okami questioned looking around confused. She walked around the grassy square in search of her disappearing friend. As she did she felt her foot slip, and she found herself falling.

Okami fell and fell as she tumbled over and over again until she reached the bottom with a thud. Okami gowned in response to her soar body as she struggled to her feet. As she looked onward her pain was overshadowed by her disbelief. Infront of her looked like some eligant parlor. " No way, did I hit my head in that fall?"

Okami walked around the circular room, in front of her laid to doors. One incredibly small one that was no taller than her boots, the other was a massive door at least twenty feet tall!" Next she looked at the table, setting there as if left for her was a glass bottle of what looked like cherry juice, and a box of frosted cookies. She looked around to make sure none was watching and shrugged " Might as well ."

Which item dose she go for?
15532.title: Okami

choices: Neither She's in another identical room but tiny compared to it
155321.content:
( pic link added by Gilligfan http://ookamisanandhersevencompanions.wi... )


Okami uncorked the bottle and brought it to her nose. It smelled of cherry's, but also other fruits as well, strange. She quickly downs the substance and gags at the taste, resembling bitter tasting cough syrup. " Gross." She said setting the empty vial on the table. She next turned her attention to the two keys on the table. She picked up the small key, the peculiar thing was it seemed to be growing in her hand.

Okami just watched as the table grew in-front of her. She just stood dumbfound as she dwindled down to six inches tall! " W... What happened to me?! I'm the size of a doll!" She shouts before hearing her now high pitched voice, clasping her hand over her mouth. She suddenly is glad Tsurugaya isn't here. Okami picks up the side of the now giant key, and drags it over to the door. She struggles for a bit as she lifts it to the key hole, then pushes with all her might to turn the key, and the door creeks open.

Okami steps through the door and sees that everything is _______!
155321.title: Curiouser and curiouser.

choices: Pocketing the brownies and have a drink!
Try out a brownie! Beyond the BIG door?
Forget caution! Eat all 3 brownies! Uh-Oh too big for the big door! Cramped room
1553213.content:
Okami stepped through the door only to find herself in an identical room to the 1st
however there were a few key differences.


1: She was now tiny compared to the normal sized furnishings
2: Even tiny she could tell this room while almost identical to the 1st was clearly an unbelievable 5 times larger
3: That was further proven by the huge door that had to be over 100 Feet tall next to a tiny door perfect for her current size.

Okami was slightly annoyed but then remembered the key to the door she had just come through. She turned around to go back to see the door and key had somehow vanished.

"Crap" she said flatly.

Then she walked over to the table noting the table was clear see through glass. On top she saw 1 tiny key , 1 huge key that barely fit on the table as well as another identical box of cookies and drink from the 1st room.

She tried to climbed up the table but slipped on its legs unable to maintain a grip.

Disappointed she was about to give up when 2 things appeared a few feet away as if by magic. The first thing was a bottle like the 1st two but scaled to her tiny size.

The other thing was a plate with 3 chocolate brownies also scaled to her size.
Suddenly her stomach rumbled loudly even for her shrunken state. She was downright starving having not eaten since lunch the previous day. Ignoring her hunger Okami considered her options.

On the 1 hand she was fairly certain the drink would shrink her further possibly enough to creep under the door. On the other hand she had no clue what effect eating would have if any.

Eventually she decides on...
1553213.title: Neither She's in another identical room but...

choices: Shockingly to scale even at her enlarged size
She's 40 Feet tall yet Tiny here?!
As expected for now the 40 Foot Tall Okami is larger than many things!
155322.content:
Once she was sure no one was around or looking Ookami opened the box of cookies there had to be maybe 3 or 4 dozen. She plucked one out and began nibbling it eating every crumb in about 90 seconds.

She next turned her attention to the two keys on the table. She picked up the slightly larger key,
the peculiar thing was it seemed to be growing smaller and smaller in her hand.


Ookami watched as the table and other objects around her Seemed to shrink.
She just stood dumbfound as she grew and grew to an incredible 40 Feet tall and banged her on the ceiling. Luckily her growth ended there.

"Ouch! That didn't feel good" she said rubbing her now slightly sore head. After a few minutes she took in her surroundings, her new vantage point and her body.

"W-whoa! W... What happened to me?! I'm so..so BIG. This is so cool, I could get used to this!"

Secretly she wishes she could be this big back home or even bigger.

Okami picks up the now tiny key before an idea occurs to her. She closes the lid on the cookie box then puts both it and the bottled drink in her pocket.

Okami carefully went over to the door then unlocked it and the door creeks open.


Okami steps through the door and sees that everything is _______!

choices: She decides to stay at her current giant size!

1553223.content:
Okami looked around her surroundings to find she was in a maze of rose bushes. Or it would have been a maze if it didn't only reach her waist at her size. " Wow, this place is incredible." She said stepping over some the walls. As she dose so she looks down by her feet and sees a now tiny Hanzel And Gretel. Okami just sighs, now she has to deal with this annoying duo.

http://ookamisanandhersevencompanions.wi...

" Gretel, have you seen a girl run by in a maid outfit?" Gretel seems a bit wary of the giantess, but composes herself. " Gretel, who's Gretel? He's Tweedle Dee." She says pointing to her brother. Her brother returns the gesture " And she is Tweedle Dum.... Or perhaps it's the other way around?"

Okami just shakes her head. " Sure, I'll buy your name is Dum. Now please answer my question." She taps her giant foot in annoyance, debating if she should place it on the two. " Hmm, I think she went that way." She points to a village to the right before scratching her head. " Or perhaps she went into the woods. Or maybe she." Okami snatched up the annoying brunette in her hand holding her in front of her face like a doll.

" Listen here you annoying little freak, I don't want to spend all damn day walking all over! Now think long and hard, where did the maid you had spotted go?" The frightened Gretel squealed a bit before pointing at the house. " Thank you." She angrily released the girl back to her brother who was currently attacking her boot. She simply stepped over the pair and walked on, leaving the petrified Gretel sitting on the ground.

Okami stopped herself from getting too close to the house. " Perhaps I shouldn't walk up to a house when I'm the size of a house." She took out the bottle and wondered if she should drink it.

Toko still normal size in her pink party dress floated gently down landing on a bunch of pillows.

She looked around and saw a long hallway.

"What a long hallway! I do hope there is a way out" she said as she stood up.


She began walking down the hall. Eventually she came to a room at the end. She entered and found herself in the largest grandest most elegant ballroom she had ever seen.



There was a staircase leading to a balcony overlooking the entire room and a chandelier in the middle. The room oddly however only had 2 other doors aside from the one Toko had entered through. 1 door was tiny maybe 6 inches tall tops the other door was huge at least 60 feet tall and about 20 feet shy of the ballroom ceiling.



"Wow what an amazing ballroom! I wonder why no one seems to be here though" said Toko as she looked around.


Stepping forward she stopped in front of the 2 doors.


"Wow this place is odd! Who on earth could ever fit through these 2 doors. Perhaps ill just turnaround"


Just as she turned around she noticed the door she had entered through had somehow disappeared.


"The door I came through.. I-its gone it vanished somehow" she exclaimed.



Just then she noticed a glass end table nearby that wasn't there before. On it was a very odd assortment of objects.


There was a tiny key presumably for the tiny door, a very large key at least twice as large as Toko was tall, a tea kettle and an empty teacup and lastly a box of at least 3 dozen cookies all with the words "EAT ME" on them in icing or sprinkles.


Toko walked up to the table and mulled over the objects on it when her stomach growled in hunger.


Giving into her sweet tooth and her stomach.
Toko grabbed a cookie and ate it.


A few moments later Toko began to feel strange then to her surprise she started growing.


"Huh what in the world? I-I'm growing bigger somehow" she exclaimed as she inched bigger and bigger. The only good news was her clothing and everything were all growing in even proportions.


Bigger and bigger Toko grew until she was 50 feet tall a bit shy of the 60 foot tall door and 80 foot tall ceiling.


"Oh my that was such a strange experience and I got so big too"


Toko then grabbed the box of cookies and placed it in 1 of the pockets of her pink dress. As of yet she hasn't realized food , drink or certain other things in this strange place could affect her size.


Suddenly an extra cookie appeared on a plate next to the tea kettle and teacup. For the moment Toko ignored this. Feeling thirsty taking advantage of of size she opted to forego the teacup and picked up the tea kettle with 2 fingers.


Bringing it to her mouth she poured 1/2 its contents down her throat. Satisfied Toko sat the team kettle back on the table.


Next she contemplated what to do when..

1553333322131.content:
On a warm summer day, two friends are sitting in the shade underneath a tree.

One of them, a girl by the name of Melody was trying to read a book. "Ugh, this book is so boring!" She whined as she threw the book away.





"Come on Melody," Her boyfriend Ben smiled. "Just one more chapter and you're down. It's for your summer reading." He was a boy around the same age as Melody.



He had messy chocolate brown hair and bright green eyes. He wore a black T-shirt, brown pants and blue shoes.




"I don't care. I just wish there something fun we could do instead." Melody argued as she went to the river. "Don't you ever wish that life could be, could be..." Melody paused for a minute before an idea came to her. "That's it!"





"What's it?" Ben asked her. "If we had our own little world everything would be nonsense. There'll be animals would wear clothes, flowers can talk and clouds we can ride on."




Ben sits down beside her and smiles, "That sounds like fun. That's what I like about you Melody, it's your imagination."




Both of them laugh as they stared at their reflections in the water. It wasn't long before they heard fast approaching feet. Melody looked up and was amazed by what she saw. "Ben," She cried as she shook his shoulder. "Melody, what is..." He stopped in mid sentence as saw it.




"Is that a white rabbit wearing a waist coat?" He asked as he notice the white rabbit wearing expensive clothes. The rabbit pulled out a chained watch out of his pocket.




"And a pocket watch?" Melody added. The rabbit panicked. "Oh my fur and whiskers! I'm so very late." The white rabbit dashed away.




"Odd, what could a rabbit be late for? A carrot convention?" Ben Joked.




"I'll would like to know," Melody announced as she got off. "Mr. Rabbit, please wait." She cried as she hurried after him. "Are you sure this is good idea?" Ben yelled as she followed them.





The rabbit dove into a cave so small that one would have to get on their hands and knees and crawl to get in. By the time Ben arrived, Melody was half-way in. Against his better judgement, he went into the cave. "Melody, are you sure this is a good idea?"





"Aren't you curious about where this rabbit?" She responded. Both teens kept on going. "I'm pretty sure this counts as stalking, and curiosity often lead to trou-BBLLE!" He cried as the ground under disappeared and the two teens fall down



------------------




Melody finally landed on something soft. "That was weird," She said. She looked up and saw several objects floating around. There was a mirror, a chair, a jar and even a book case full of books. "Good thing we didn't get hurt," She smiled before looking at down. Her eyes widen as she realize her clothes had changed.



(This is what she's dress like, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoQ4jKYb4...

http://youtu.be/VPNHA-LcoCg )



"HOLY COW! WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON?" She screamed. "How this happened? Why am I dressed like this?" She was both scared and disturb by this. Then she remembered something much more important; Ben.


"Ben? Ben Where are you?" She called out.



"Down here," a voiced groaned.



Melody quickly got up and turned to help her friend up. But stopped. Her friend had been transformed into a rabbit. "Ben," Melody stuttered. Ben blissfully unaware of this looked gazed upwards at her. "UH did you get taller?" She was 3 times his size. Now he only came up to her knees.




Melody delayed with the answer. How can tell her friend he was no longer human Then an idea came to her. She grabbed the mirror that floating by and handed it to him. "I think you need to see for yourself." He stared at his reflection to see he had became a brown rabbit. He had the only natural reaction to this.




"WHAT THE HELL? I'M A RABBIT!" He shouted. "Aww it's not that bad," She said reassuringly as she got down on her knees and pet his ears. "You're kinda cute like this.




He wanted to scold for saying that but stopped as she stroke his new ears, "Thanks Melody. And you look very pretty in that dress." Melody blushed after hearing that.




"I'm late, I'm late!" They turned their heads to see the white rabbit running to a door neither of them had noticed.





"Mr. Rabbit, we need your help!" She cried as she got up and followed him.




"Wait for me!" Ben called out as he followed them. "Cursed these short legs," He grumbled.



What will happen to our heroes now?

1553333322131.title: Melody and Ben's adventures

choices: Yes but she grabs another white Mochi! Bigger Melody! Room adjusts to her size..
15533333221311.content:
The white Rabbit opened the door. "Wait, please stop," Melody cried.



The rabbit either not heard her or didn't care.


He went on in as he repeated the phrase, "I'm Late! I'm late!"



A few seconds later Melody arrived at the door and stopped.



"I don't understand how he can so fast," Ben panted. "He's the same size as me and still out ran me.




"Well maybe you're out of shape," Melody giggled.





Ben gave her a cross look, "Very funny. And what's your excuse? Your legs are longer than mine!"


Melody didn't answer as she looked at the door and opened it. Both entered and ended up in what could be best described as a very long hallway with many doors.



"Which one did he go through," Ben wondered aloud.



Melody shrugged and went to the first door on the left and tried to open it. But it was locked. She went around the hallway and tried to open the others but they were locked too. They return to the place where they had entered but the door had changed.



Where there once was a door big enough for a horse to walk through was now a door so small that only Ben could fit in. Luckily for it wasn't locked



"How am I going get through?" She sighed.



Then a small 3 legged stool with a plate with Mochi cakes on it.




"That wasn't there before," Ben commented.



....But considering Melody was wearing a new outfit and Ben was a rabbit, she really didn't put any thought in it.

(Mochi are Japanese Rice cakes)
( http://youtu.be/VPNHA-LcoCg )


There were two types of Mochi on said plate, red mochi and white mochi. As well a sheet of paper attach to the table with the words, 'Eat Me and Enter' written on it.




"Eat me and enter?" ...... "What does that even mean?" Ben questioned. This place was getting curiouser and curiouser by the minute.





"Maybe if I eat of these, I'll get smaller," Melody said.







"I don't know, I got a bad feeling about this." Ben replied. He really felt this was a bad idea.




Melody wasn't listening as she picked up one of the white mochi, "I am kinda hungry. Besides, whats the worst that could happen?"



She took a bite of it, suddenly she began to grow at a rapid speed in growth spurts. She gasped and cried out a bit with with each of the growth spurts.



( http://youtu.be/VPNHA-LcoCg )


She had 5 spurts in all "OUCH!" She screamed as her head hit the ceiling from the final growth spurt.



Ben had managed to dash away from her explosive growth. Thankfully her growing was over.




Ben walked over to and shouted, "Are you all right?"




"NO I'M NOT!" She bellowed. Ben heard her sniffle a bit, "Now,"




Ben gulped as he feared what was coming next.



"NOW, NOW I WILL NEVER GET HOME!" She started crying like there was no tomorrow. Even worse, her tears were bucket size, one of them landed on Ben, leaving him wet as a drowned rat.





"Come on Melody, you're a big girl! You're too old for this!" Her loud moaning blocked out his voiced. He got scared as he notice the water level was rising. He climbed up her white apron to avoid drowning.




"Melody, please stop this! You're gonna drown me," He shouted why hopped up and down. That's when he saw the plate of red and white mochi floating in the tears. If the white ones made her grow, then maybe a red one will shrink her.




"Melody, you have to eat one of the red mochi!" Ben cried.


Does she hear him

Then like before Melody had 5 more growth spurts this time the room growing bigger to accommodate her.

"OH NO THAT JUST MADE THINGS WAY WORSE" wailed Melody beginning to cry anew though now the tears were shockingly 4X larger than before.

155333332221.content:
It was a perfect beautiful day in the land of Cagliostro for all but one person the lovely and kind hearted Princess Clarisse whose parents had forced her into a marriage with the uncouth Count(can't remember his last name) "I don't love him and I really do not want to marry him!" She complained to her parents the King and Queen of the country but they refused to hear her pleas and informed her the Count would make a good husband but Clarisse wasn't so sure he felt so creepy and she hated to imagine the life they would have together so to get out of this unfortunate turn of events she did the only reasonable thing:flee quietly she snuck away from the castle just the day before the wedding her parents,the town and groom to be had no idea she even left Clarisse headed into a nearby cave up in the mountains practically having to crawl in as the opening is so narrow just as a downpour began.

As she rested on the cold,hard ground Clarisse weighted out her options she could either stay hidden in this cave forever hiding out from her cruel husband to be and family or she could go back and confront her fears what was a princess to do? As she sat there wringing out her ruined wedding dress soaked from the rain the soft ground beneath her feet gave away and she let out a scream as she was sucked into the earth "Ahhhhhhhhh someone help me!" She cried as she was soon falling but luckily her wedding dress is so big she is able to use it as a type of parachute to slow her descend "Ohh thank goodness!" She thought as it looked like it was going to be smooth sailing from here when out of the blue there was another scream but it didn't come from her but from a person,a boy right above her also falling down the hole at a amazing speed one she'd never seen before he had dark brown hair,green eyes,was wearing a black T-shirt,brown pants and white shoes Clarisse was so absorbed stating at the ten year old boy shooting past her she didn't notice her dress suddenly deflating as she also fell through the air only to land on solid ground "Ohh good thing I managed to land safety and sound but I do wonder what happened to that strange little boy I saw earlier?" She thought to herself then she noticed the ground she was on happened to be soft,really soft and it was breathing and squirming around a bit "Ohh how odd...Ohhh dear!" She cried as she realized what she was sitting on was that strange little boy she quickly got off him and reached down helping him up "Ohh dear me I'm very sorry about that are you alright?" She asked he nodded
"Yeah although that was some crazy fall anyway who are you and where am I?"
"I was about to ask you the same why are your clothes so odd looking?"
"It's hard to explain so I'll start out with the easy part my name is Ben and why are you dressed like that? You going to get married or something?" Clarisse blushed
"Well I was but unfortunately the man I was supposed to be getting married to is a complete rude and cold-hearted person so I fled for my life but that's no longer important right now since we're both sort of stuck here we might as well find and find a way out ohh sorry I didn't introduce myself my name is Princess Clarisse." As she held out her hand for him to shake
"You're a princess,a actual princess? Whoa cool!" Ben exclaimed awestruck Clarisse giggled at his expression as they continued onwards.

1553333322211.content:
A long discussion about each other's lives and a half hour later the two were already close friends maybe something more(this was just before Ben found the Omniwatch thing)

"Ohh you must have a very fasincating life Ben!" Clarisse exclaimed Ben blushed


"Yeah well it can get pretty dull at times,often I wish something exciting would happen but I guess I finally got my wish this is as exciting and thrilling as it gets by the way I wonder where we are?" As he looked around it appeared to be a giant hallway of sorts there was nothing really interesting here except for a glass table,a doorway hidden behind some curtains and colorful walls "Whoa nice curtains!" Ben exclaimed.


Clarisse was meanwhile trying to force the door open
"Ohh it looks like we're a little too big to fit Ben!" As she unsuccessfully tried to squeeze through Ben looking around pointed at the glass table


"Hey maybe if one of us drinks a sip of whatever is in that bottle it might do something I....I Er saw it in a movie once." Clarisse arched a eyebrow.


"What's a movie?"


"Never mind here you should drink it I'm not sure I should attempt it after all I'm only a kid!" As he handed her the bottle and she took two or three sips and immediately began to shrink in spurts.


"Ohh my! What's happening to me?" As she grew smaller and smaller soon Ben resembled a giant even his feet towered over her.


"Whoops sorry Clarisse guess I should have seen that coming but hey take a bite of one of these..." As he saw the tiny box filled with cookies at his feet and handed her one the minute she bit into it Clarisse's eyes grew wide,she got a funny feeling in her stomach and suddenly without warnings she grew rather than shrink! Taller and wider she became until now she was the one who towered over Ben at least over 70 feet tall the top of her head was smushed up against the roof of the room almost breaking through "Ohhh My!" She cried out Ben had to cover his ears from the sound of her voice and patted her left foot
"Now Clarisse it...its...not that bad,could be worse!" He joked hoping she would calm down but on the contrary she became hysterical
"Worse? How can this possibly be an....worse....." As she sniffled Ben saw what was about to occur
"Uh oh! Please Clarisse don't,...." He begged but too late she became crying and as she was a nearly 70 foot giantess her tears were enormous Ben had the toughest time dodging them as the room quickly filled up
"Clarisse Please Stop Crying! Yo...you'll flood the room and is along with it!" But she couldn't force herself to stop
"Ohhhh this is too much! I....I'm far too big to move! Ben....get out of here while you still can!" But he refused to leave her even that meant he drowned in her pool of tears and touched by his refusal Clarisse reached down and scooped him up saving him from a fatal fate and granted him a quick,passionate kiss before taking the bottle from before now filled with her salty tears she took a sip and magically shrunk back to normal
"Help I can't swim!" Ben cried out as he was struggling to stay afloat as she accidentally dropped him when she shrunk Clarisse quickly grabbed hold of his hands and pulled him into the bottle big enough to contain both luckily the door from before was knocked off its hinges by Clarisse's frantic crying fit and both were on their way to the rest of Wonderland
1553333322211.title: Continue

1553333322213.content:
Princess Clarisse and Ben wandered the hallway, looking for a way out. Clarisse let Ben hold her hand as they walked. She couldn't help but notice that Ben blushed and giggled. Clarisse found to the boy to be cute and guess she had a crush on him. Alas, the boy was far too young for her. Then they found a door.



The Princess opened it only to find smaller door that opened from the opposite. She opened that door and found another door, even smaller. She kept on until the last door which was so small that she and Ben had to get on their hands and knees to crawl through.



The room they had entered was big as the inside of a barn. On the other end on the room was a door the size of a rabbit hole.


"What are we going to do now?" Ben asked. Clarisse thought for a moment or two and notice a glass table with a golden key and a plate of cookies.



"That wasn't there before," Clarisse said. There were two types of cookies on said plate, chocolate cookies with the words 'Eat Me' written in chocolate chips and sugar cookies with the words written frosting.



Since she skipped breakfast, Clarisse felt hungry and took one of the chocolate cookies. No sooner as she ate the cookie she grew at a ridiculous speed that she fell on her rear end. Her head had slammed into ceiling. Now she was 70 feet tall and nearly filled the whole room. Ben climbed up her dress and sat on her knee.


He saw a sad look on her face and smiled, "Cheer up, it's not like it's the end of the world."



Unfortunately this had the opposite reaction he hopping for. "Well it may not be for you but this is the worst day of my life!" She cried so loudly that Ben had to cover his ears.



"My parents want me to marry a horrible man, I had to run away from my home...and now," she sniffled. Ben gulped as he knew what was coming.


"Now, now I get even get out!" Princess Clarisse started crying, Ben was hit by one of her bucket size tears.


Soon to the room began to flood and Ben desperately tried get her to calm down.


"Clarisse! You need to stop or you'll drown us both!" He yelled. She stopped crying and picked Ben up and hugged him. Suddenly the floor disappeared, sending the giant princess plummeting.



Now she was over the ocean and was falling like a stone. She held Ben closed to her bosom as they plunges into the salty waters. A few seconds later she breach the surface and looked at Ben.


"Are you okay," She asked calmly. Ben sat in the palm of her hand coughed smiled at her,


"Yea I'm fine. How did we wind up in the middle of the ocean?"



"I don't know," replied before she placed him on top her head before. She hopped she can find dry land soon.

It was a typical morning for the young maid as the sun rose over London. Mey Rin slipped her pale feet into her black stockings as she laced up her boots.


The red haired woman looked in the mirror at her uncovered hazel eyes. Part of her wished that she could go without her hideous glasses, perhaps then Black or even Baldroy would see her more than the maid who couldn't help herself.... Perhaps tomorrow, she thought to herself as she slipped on the eyewear.



Mey Rin hummed to herself as she walked down the hall, the young masters breakfast in hand. " Wake up young master." Her annoying, heavily accented voice called out. No response was given as she spoke to the walls. " M... Master Ciel?!" She called as she set the tray to the side and investigated more. The room was undisturbed besides the unmade bed and open window near said bed... Which she made in a quick manner.




The maid walked over to the open window seeing a blurry figure in the distance... She removed the glasses and instantly focused in on the person... It was Ran-Mao, staring tauntingly back at her on the window!

( http://kuroshitsuji.wikia.com/wiki/Ran-M... )


The oriental woman acrobatically leapt past her and hurried down the hallway. " That woman better not have anything to do with this." Her voice now velvet like. Mey Rin clenched her fists in anger and was about to call to her comrades but seeing as they were surly busy, and she could handle the intruder herself. She pursued only to come to a seeming dead end with three doors... One small and the other large, and the middle door normal sized, but with a broken handle.




"What is this room? I've never seen it before.." She asked herself as she looked around, nearby on a end table sat a drink of some kind and a jar of candy and sweets. Her stomach growled. As she looked at them... She approached them as if drawn to them by some addiction. But which one does she choose?

15533333322234.content:
Ok so I had this kinda crazy
semi new idea for

Alice in wonderland meets aliens meets
Sci-Fi meets magic which I might slip into
other interactives of mine too.



It’s modern-ish day.
All is normal for a girl who need not be
named or dressed like Alice

That is until she’s abducted and dragged into
an unexpected rabbits hole!

She is brought to a planet nearly identical
To Earth.
She never sees her captives but they speak to
her.


“Young girl you have been transported from
your home world to what we’ve dubbed
Earth-Athalon a replica of your earth nearly
identical except a few major and minor things!


You have been chosen for
“Project Choice Wonderland”
A long term experiment by several alien
races and tribunals joined together!

On this Earth you’ll find everything you need
to survive either in the wilds or civilization
however you are the ONLY Earthling!

Most things are as they are on your
Earth however this Earth is 20x larger
than your Earth and while there’s water
you’ll find no sea or oceans.

There are rivers, lakes, hot springs and
cold springs, and ponds.
You’ll also notice a lack of certain animal
species.

As part of this project you’ll notice that you
age at 1/3000th your normal rate even though
time passes as on your Earth.

Furthermore it is based in part on some of
what your culture calls wonderland media.

While some water is normal please note
the signs that will be posted near certain
plants or water sources,

There are several hot springs, cold springs,
lakes, and even plants with signs near them
labeled 1 of 3 things
“Grow”
“Shrink”
“Normalizer”

And yes as they suggest eating or drinking
them will produce the effect listed.
You can at your leisure shrink or grow in
size however as you are in captivity here
you’ll find that even if you tried outgrowing
planets there’s a limit and an impenetrable
barrier!


If you try to escape or outgrow it the
barrier WILL ZAP and shrink you in a
painful process unlike that of the
magic water or plants.

Also please note that aside from the barrier
if you’re enlarged to more than
10x your normal size or shrunken to any smaller
than doll sized or roughy 10 inches you’ll
gain invulnerability to everything except the
barrier.


Also please note that in addition to housing
for your normal size you’ll find scaled up
housing for you while giant sized should you
want or need it however you will not
find real housing for you in your shrunken
state unless of course you locate a dollhouse.


You’ll also find that nothing on this faux
Earth is poisonous!
We wish you luck as we observe you
on this unique experiment!
Also you’ll find a few things more high
tech than you might be accustomed to
such as Robots, Androids, several smart
devices and also Q & A booths with signs
should you need to talk to us again!


With that the experiment and your
captivity monitoring has begun”

Hibiki was about to question things
when she realized she was still unclothed
in this different hot springs and she
started to feel strange. A faint glow and
strange energy radiated from her.


She glances at the towel she had covering
herself and noticed it was getting... Smaller?


Her face made a curious “O” face.


It wasn’t just her towel.
The water was becoming shallow?
And the nearby boulders were getting
smaller too?


Hibiki then noticed a sign next to
the spring
“Grow in the supersizing spring”


Hibiki noticed that the spring which
wasn’t too big to begin with was
becoming too small.
Her growing legs reach across it.


She quickly stands up and gets out.
Her growth finally slowed down.
When she stopped growing she
was almost speechless.


She didn’t realize it but she was now
80 feet tall.
She looked at the towel in her hand
that once would’ve covered about
1/5th of her was now little more
than a tissue to her.


“Wow those aliens were telling the truth”

She looked at herself in awe.

“I got... big?”

Hibiki had mixed feelings.

info.brief_description: Alice In Wonderland with an Anime Twist *More Description inside * ALSO IT NEVER ENDS!
info.description:
Who doesnt love Alice In Wonderland? And its MANY Interpretations? We've surely seen some adaption or another especially in Anime or Manga so I figured Why not do an interactive take on that?


I'm pretty open on this but airing on the side of caution the ASR rating is for Anime characters that can get a bit non PG/E

Rules as Follows:

1: NO ENDING OF THE STORY PERIOD!! Personally I find the original and it's adaptions far too short so keep things going as long as possible please.

2: Growing and Shrinking ( Size Change ) scenes are highly encouraged! The more the merrier! Frankly I feel some adaptations don't have enough or rush the story. Heck even the original sadly only had around 4 of each. So have fun just dont go overkill on huge ( Planet sized ) or Tiny ( Microscopic and such )

3: NO American McGee, Tim Burton or the like incarnation I didn't care for those! Likewise NO Creepy Pasta! Shrinking or out growing of clothes is permissible other than that the rest is a no go

4: NO Death, No Scat or the like
5: Please try to use decent spelling and grammar. I'm not a Grammar Nazi but at least make it readable! This includes spacing of Paragraphs. Reading entries that are a Wall-O-Text is a pet peeve

6: After a certain point please try to minimize short chapters unless it's for adding choices.

7: I reserve the right to Edit, modify, delete chapters for ANY Reasons but usually only for rule breaking.

8: in case I didn't say it aside from American McGee, Tim Burton or creepy stuff ANY Alice In Wonderland incarnation including books, films, specials, movies, Anime, manga, fan art, fan fiction ,or even something completely different as long as the story is kept going sticks to Alice In Wonderland in some manner and size changes occur to whoever is playing the part of "Alice" it's fine



So go have fun peeps


** 4/13/2015 7:05pm EST
Update + New rule since I've apparently had to make it a rule on account of 3 people ***

Rule # 9 if you Insist on choosing a Male to play Alice HE MUST Either be turned Female at some point or at least be a "TRAP" ( I.E. Can crossdress and pass as female because after all Alice always wears some kind of dress or Skirt and by pass as female I actually mean you look at them and could almost never guess they were cross dressing )

I'm all for "Gender Equality" however male size change is NOT Really my cup of tea and there are a bunch of interactive a that openly allow makes with little to no restriction. Sorry for this but please respect the wishes of the story moderators


*** 5/12/2015 Update


New Rule

Rule #10 Since someone didn't find it self explanatory or obvious please Limit the Number of Non Human characters. This isn't Charmy Kitty, Cats or Animals in wonderland. I'll settle for what was already added recently but please stick to the main focus/idea

Rule 10 A: I Will allow Anthros leaning towards mostly human appearence. ( Neko/Catgirls, Mousegirls, Fox Girls, Some Dog/Wolfgirls but thats it )


***12/5/15 update

Again people please STOP TRYING TO HAVE/ADD Size changing males in here! There are plenty of stories with that in elsewhere! Chapters containing or leading to that WILL Continue to be deleted!

Also please no "insert yourself" type options unless you're playing the role of a female! The ONLY Exceptions are those granted by the authoress or story mods or if a male gets turned female and put in female dress prior to their 1st intended size change please and thank you



~Kind regards and happy holidays
PK and the story mods of this story ~


**7/5/2019 Update
Some extra exceptions have been added
Tittle updated and now cartoons and other
stuff is allowed ( see new chapters for details )
